pages.title: Netherite Shield
pages.text: $(li)The Netherite Shield is improved version of the $(l:patchouli:weapons/diamond_shield)Diamond Shield $(/l)with more durability than the last one.$(br)$(li)To equip it, just open your inventory and place the Shield into your left hand slot.

pages.name: Netherite Shield
pages.text: This item can't be burned in fire or lava.
